snippet.title: Lingotopia Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Lingotopia is a language learning game about being lost in a city where you don't speak the language.

Coming to Steam and itch.io for PC, Mac and Linux August 2018.

Find out more https://www.lingoludo.com/

localized.title: Lingotopia Teaser Trailer
localized.description:
Lingotopia is a language learning game about being lost in a city where you don't speak the language.

Coming to Steam and itch.io for PC, Mac and Linux August 2018.

Find out more https://www.lingoludo.com/
